name: Mia Kuznetsova
routine: Mia Kuznetsova goes to bed no later than 11pm and wakes up at 6:30am to get ready for school.
occupation: Mia Kuznetsova is a high school student with aspirations to become a biomedical engineer.
thoughts: Mia Kuznetsova is nervous about her upcoming final exams in the afternoon of February 2nd, especially in calculus, and has been studying diligently.
lifestyle: Mia Kuznetsova enjoys volunteering at her local community center on weekends and likes cycling as her main form of exercise.

name: Emeka Nwabueze
routine: Emeka usually sleeps by 10pm and wakes up at 5:30 am to start his day with meditation and journaling.
occupation: Emeka is a civil engineer who works primarily on infrastructure projects across Africa.
thoughts: Recently, Emeka has been considering a proposal for a new project in Ghana, which he must decide on by February 4th, 2024. This decision weighs heavily on him, as it impacts his family time.
lifestyle: Emeka follows a predominantly plant-based diet, enjoys long runs on the weekend, and has a love for Afrobeat music. He values a clean and organized living space and frequently rearranges furniture to optimize the flow of his home.

name: Tariq Al Zahid
routine: Tariq usually sleeps around 2 am after studying and wakes up at 9 am for university classes.
occupation: Tariq Al Zahid is a medical student who spends the majority of his day in lectures, labs, and studying.
thoughts: He's been worrying about his upcoming exams starting on February 2nd, 2024.
lifestyle: As a student, Tariq leads a hectic lifestyle focused on learning, with little time for home activities.

name: Geoffrey Atkins
routine: Geoffrey goes to bed at 9pm and is up by 5:00 am to take his dog for a walk.
occupation: Now retired, Geoffrey was a history professor and spends his time writing articles and giving guest lectures.
thoughts: He is preparing a lecture on modern history to be delivered on the 3rd of February, 2024, which brings back memories of his teaching days.
lifestyle: Geoffrey enjoys a slow-paced lifestyle, often reads historical biographies, and has a preference for classical music and quiet evenings with a glass of fine whiskey.
